What is Aren Desai's portfolio like?: [arendesai.com/portfolio] You can explore his portfolio here, which includes descriptions of his degrees, certifications, and links to LinkedIn and GitHub. He also has a detailed resume available at [arendesai.com/resume_nodetails.pdf].
Can you share some of Aren's data scienc: [arendesai.com/datascience] Check out his MarketSimOptimizer project for simulating the MISO market, as well as his work on LMP forecasting using LEAR and DNN models. His This GCP Website project showcases his experience with Google Cloud Platform.
What robotics projects has Aren worked o: [github.com/WisconsinRobotics/WRoverSoftware] Aren contributed to the WRoverSoftware for the Wisconsin Rover project at UW-Madison.

What programming languages does Aren kno: Aren is proficient in Python, Java, JavaScript, Julia, C, C++, C#, R, SQL, and MatLab.

What is Aren's experience with cloud pla: [github.com/ArenKDesai/ArenWebsite] His website is hosted on Google Cloud Platform (GCP), and he also runs an LLM on GCP for this project.

What was Aren's role in the Google Devel: Aren served as the Finance Lead for the Google Developer Student Club from 2023-2024, demonstrating his leadership skills in tech communities.
